lead_paragraph: The Israeli police said Thursday that they had arrested a teenager at a Jewish settlement as a suspect in the arson attack on the central mosque in the West Bank.
snippet: The Israeli police said Thursday that they had arrested a teenager at a Jewish settlement as a suspect in the arson attack on the central mosque in the West Bank.

headline.main: West Bank: Teenager Suspected in Fire at Mosque
headline.print_headline: West Bank: Teenager Suspected In Fire at Mosque
